aboutHeroDesc: "Avita" LLC was founded in August 2013. Our goal is to reduce supply chain time and costs of international cargo transportation through innovative ideas, rational processes, and constant monitoring.
aboutDescription: "Avita" LLC was founded in August 2013. Number of employees: â‰ˆ 5. Partner and employee satisfaction is a primary concern for the organization. We aim to provide efficient, cost-effective, and reliable logistics solutions for our clients worldwide.
advGeoDesc: Cargo transportation geography: more than 197 countries
advExpDesc: Experience: more than 5 years in logistics and international cargo
advUniqueDesc: A unique approach to each project to ensure optimal results
advEffDesc: We optimize every step of the supply chain to save time and cost
advDocDesc: Accurate paperwork, customs clearance, and insurance handled professionally
advTrustDesc: Every second customer comes with the guarantee of the previous one. We cooperate with both individuals and companies
customerDesc1: Our priority is to ensure timely deliveries with zero compromise on safety and quality.
customerDesc2: We continuously innovate logistics solutions and provide personal attention to every shipment.
customerDesc3: Partner satisfaction, transparency, and long-term relationships are the cornerstones of our business.
